TopicTitle: Video Wednesdays: Space Scumbag's Random Clips

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/87dda5f22121633ebc5ff4dc817129a6/tumblr_inline_n8gzz43A9o1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/CCm1gfcJOXw" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>Whether there’s total destruction or complete awesomeness, <strong>Space_Scumbag</strong> always has something cooking. Here’s a recent compilation of him goofing around in <em>KSP</em>.</p>
There's totally a Star Citizen tribute in there. Awesome.
Pretty great ... if only this level of creativity were applied to actual rocket science, we would be sipping margaritas in orbit around Jupiter right now
So stupid, and so disorganized ;;; I couldn't stop watching though.
I was laughing so hard I cried a little, the Foosball table and Gypsy Danger... oh man that was great

I was laughing so hard I cried a little, the Foosball table and Gypsy Danger... oh man that was great

Still my favorite!

I'm glad you guys like my stuff. And it would be nice to share it on the KSP facebook page, more views is always good. New videos will follow the next weeks. I have planned so much awesome and silly stuff.

I'm glad you guys like my stuff. And it would be nice to share it on the KSP facebook page, more views is always good. New videos will follow the next weeks. I have planned so much awesome and silly stuff.

Nice video!

Also, do you have a craft file laying around? I want to get that train into space.
Omega? Great shout-out to Mass Effect 2.

Omega? Great shout-out to Mass Effect 2.

You should watch my other videos, there are many more references to Mass Effect.

There's totally a Star Citizen tribute in there. Awesome.

yeah saw that to. also in case it wasn't obvious the giant robot is pacific rim
Spaceship in a can, just add water? Waaaay to much free time there, but amusing.
